detail_desc: STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined, print-patterned bikini top with triangular cups and ties at the back of the neck attached to decorative rings at the front. Elasticated hem and ties at the back.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a concealed zip at the back, bell-shaped panels at the sides of the hem and a short slit at the front. Short sleeves with gathers for a draped effect. Partly lined.
Knee-length dress in a patterned weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length, cuffed puff sleeves. Seam with double-layered trim at the waist. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with gently dropped shoulders and 3/4-length puff sleeves with a frill trim. Gathered, softly draping yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
V-neck blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with gently dropped shoulders and 3/4-length puff sleeves with a frill trim. Gathered, softly draping yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in poplin made from a cotton and linen blend with a deep V-neck, wrapover front with a fastening at one side, short puff sleeves, a smocked seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem.

Calf-length dress in a fine, rib-knit viscose blend with a collar, V-neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Straight-cut top in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Short shorts in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and frill-trimmed hems.
Short shorts in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and frill-trimmed hems.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a tab and metal buckle at the side of the waistband, and a wrapover front with an inner button. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a tab and metal buckle at the side of the waistband, and a wrapover front with an inner button. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a tab and metal buckle at the side of the waistband, and a wrapover front with an inner button. Unlined.
Chinos in airy, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Chinos in airy, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Chinos in airy, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Calf-length skirt in a jacquard weave with a high paper bag waist and wide, detachable tie belt. Side pockets and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist. Long sleeves with a slit and drawstring at the cuffs, and an asymmetric skirt that is shorter at the front. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide, elasticated flounce at the top that continues over the arms, a concealed zip in one side and a flare to the hem. Jersey lining.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide, elasticated flounce at the top that continues over the arms, a concealed zip in one side and a flare to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short, off-the-shoulder, fitted dress in a smocked weave with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a frill trim at the top and hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder, fitted dress in a smocked weave with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a frill trim at the top and hem.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back, narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top. Decorative buttons at the front, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and straight, wide, calf-length legs.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back, narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top. Decorative buttons at the front, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and straight, wide, calf-length legs.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back, narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top. Decorative buttons at the front, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and straight, wide, calf-length legs.

Single-breasted jacket woven in a linen blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Trainers in cotton with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trainers in cotton with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trainers in cotton with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high-cut legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with decorative buttons down the front, a fake fly and raw-edge, cut-off hem. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.

Shirt in cotton with a collar, print motif on the chest and buttons down the front. Yoke with a hanger at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Ankle-length joggers in a textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Zipped side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs.
Cargo shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Two flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, one with a decorative zip.
3/4-length nylon shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and open back pockets. Low crotch and wide legs with wide elasticated hems.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in airy, jacquard-weave Tencel™ lyocell with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back and straight legs. Satin-lined bodice.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined, one-shoulder, zebra-striped swimsuit. One wide shoulder strap that ends at the middle of the back, and high-cut legs.

Set with a jacket, pair of joggers and T-shirt. Jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and side pockets. Unlined. Jersey joggers in a cotton blend with a fake fly, elasticated waist with a button and side pockets. T-shirt in cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder and a chest pocket in woven fabric.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Wide-fitting, slightly longer top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and 3/4-length sleeves.
Short dress in linen slub jersey with a round neck, narrow elastication with gathers and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in linen slub jersey with a round neck, narrow elastication with gathers and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar with a drawstring, a zip down the front and a pile-lined hood that can be divided with a zip. Flap patch front pockets with a concealed press-stud, welt side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and frills at the top and hips. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and frills at the top and hips. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a round, lace-trimmed neckline, inset lace at the top, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flare to the hem. Straight-cut hem.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a round, lace-trimmed neckline, inset lace at the top, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flare to the hem. Straight-cut hem.
Swim pants and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long sleeves and a frill trim at the shoulders. Pants with an elasticated waist. UPF 50.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with buttons and picot trims at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Jacket in woven fabric with thin shoulder pads, a pearly button at the front, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with thin shoulder pads, a pearly button at the front, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative metal button at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative metal button at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative metal button at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
